Package com.sebastienguillemin.wswrl.core.rule

Interface WSWRLRule

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultWSWRLRule
public interface WSWRLRule
A WSWRL rule.

  • Method Details

    • getRuleName

      String getRuleName()
      Returns the rule name.
      Returns:
      The name of the rule.

    • getComment

      String getComment()
      Returns the rule comment.
      Returns:
      A comment annotation associated with a rule.

    • isEnabled

      boolean isEnabled()
      Returns whether the rule is enable or not.
      Returns:
      True if the rule is enables.

    • getHead

      Set<WSWRLAtom> getHead()
      Returns the WSWRL atoms composing the rule head.
      Returns:
      The head of the current rule.

    • getBody

      Set<WSWRLAtom> getBody()
      Returns the WSWRL atoms composing the rule body.
      Returns:
      The body of the current rule.

    • calculateWeights

      void calculateWeights() throws WeightCalculationException
      Calculates the rule WSWRL atom weights.
      Throws:
      WeightCalculationException
      See Also:
      • WSWRLAtom

    • calculateConfidence

      float calculateConfidence()
      Calculates the rule confidence. Must be called after binding the variables and calling the calculateWeights function.

    • atRank

      Set<WSWRLAtom> atRank(int rankIndex)
      Returns the atoms of a specific rank of the rule.
      Parameters:
      rankIndex - The rank index of the atoms.
      Returns:
      The set of WSWRLAtom at a certain rank.

    • valuable

      Set<WSWRLAtom> valuable(Set<WSWRLAtom> atoms)
      Return the set of valuable atoms in a given set of atoms.
      Parameters:
      atoms - a set of WSWRLAtom to test
      Returns:
      the set of valuable atoms.
